# DFO Business

### Current Collaborative Agreement (CA)

::: block

-   CA is finalized until March 2026

-   Funds remaining at the end of each year (April 1) will be
    returned to participants

-   \% of each license recalculates annually based on previous season's
    quota

-   Invoices have been sent for previous years CA. 
:::
